column5: I've often passed by the small waterbody named Island Lake at the intersection of the York-Durham Line and Regional Road 15, and wondered about fishing it. Seems nice and small, safe enough for a canoe. Anyone have any experience?

Try contacting Wil Wegman.  Looks like his area of expertise.  Wil Wegman Ministry of Natural Resources Aurora District Information Assistant 905-713-7730  He posts on the Simcoe boardon occasion as well.
